def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input()))
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = list(map(int, a))

    # max_num = 0
    # for i in range(n):
    #     for j in range(i, n):
    #         for k in range(i, j+1):
    #             a[k] = f[a[k]-1]
    #         max_num = max(max_num, int(''.join(map(str, a))))
    #         for k in range(i, j+1):
    #             a[k] = int(a[k])
    # print(max_num)

    max_num = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i, n):
            for k in range(i, j+1):
                a[k] = f[a[k]-1]
            max_num = max(max_num, int(''.join(map(str, a))))
            for k in range(i, j+1):
                a[k] = int(a[k])
    print(max_num)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = list(map(int, a))

    max_num = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i, n):
            for k in range(i, j+1):
                a[k] = f[a[k]-1]
            max_num = max(max_num, int(''.join(map(str, a))))
            for k in range(i, j+1):
                a[k] = int(a[k])
    print(max_num)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f_inv = [0] * 10 
    for i in range(1, 10):
        f_inv[f[i - 1]] = i
    a = [f_inv[int(a[i])] for i in range(n)]
    a = [str(a[i]) for i in range(n)]
    a = ''.join(a)
    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f_inv = [0] * 10
    for i in range(1, 10):
        f_inv[f[i - 1]] = i
    b = [f_inv[int(a[i])] for i in range(n)]
    b = [str(b[i]) for i in range(n)]
    b = ''.join(b)
    print(b)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
